fields.title: Azure Dream
fields.description: Sid is a waiter from Japan who falls in love with his teacher. The two are separated when the teacher accidentally runs over a chicken and becomes too distraught to love. However, Sid manages to rescue the situation by composing a magical song.

fields.title: Nothing of Flower
fields.description: Catharina is a singer from London who falls in love with her arch enemy. The two are separated when the arch enemy goes away to sea. However, Catharina manages to rescue the situation by posting a gushing status update of Facebook.

fields.title: The Wind's Souls
fields.description: When a soldier from Sweden learns to sing, not everybody is supportive. However, his fortunes improve when his best friend opens a zoo. Eventually, the soldier manges to to sell his soul to the devil and earns the respect of peers.

fields.title: Wizards in the Secret
fields.description: In a world where robots are rude and reckless, one singer has no choice but to find a crime-fighting sidekick using a magic ring. After a long and drawn out battle, the singer saves the day.

fields.title: The Moon's River
fields.description: In a world where robots make the rules, one student has no choice but to release a pop song by becoming a world leader. Unfortunately, the world gets into a terrible pickle and the few survivors have to leave in a space rocket.
